Title: Analista de datos
Description:
¡En @Ayesa crecemos juntos! 🚀 ✨




Cada profesional de nuestra empresa es importante para nosotros, nos ayudan a crecer de manera diversa y gracias a ellos somos más de 13.000 personas trabajando con el mismo objetivo en más de 40 países.

Si eres una persona entusiasta, te apasiona la #tecnología y buscas un nuevo reto profesional ¡Este es tu sitio!

Estamos buscando un/a Analista de Datos que colabore estrechamente con el equipo de administración para desarrollar herramientas avanzadas de análisis que optimicen la infraestructura tecnológica y mejoren los procesos de decisión.




¡Anímate a dar el salto!¡Te estamos esperando!




Funciones:




Colaborar directamente con el equipo directivo para analizar y monitorizar el rendimiento de la infraestructura tecnológica.
Desarrollar informes y dashboards que proporcionen visibilidad en tiempo real sobre el estado de la infraestructura (almacenamiento, servidores, redes) y la calidad del servicio.
Realizar análisis predictivo para prever necesidades futuras de recursos tecnológicos (almacenamiento, capacidad de servidores, redes, etc.).
Desarrollar modelos de optimización de uso de recursos que ayuden en la planificación y distribución eficiente de la capacidad tecnológica.
Automatizar procesos de recolección y procesamiento de datos relacionados con la infraestructura tecnológica y la gestión del servicio.
Proponer mejoras y soluciones basadas en los datos para garantizar la estabilidad, rendimiento y crecimiento sostenido de la infraestructura.
Apoyar en la toma de decisiones estratégicas sobre la ampliación de la infraestructura y la implementación de nuevas tecnologías.




Conocimientos Técnicos y Tecnologías:




Título en Ingeniería Informática, Telecomunicaciones, Estadística o afines.
Experiencia en análisis de datos relacionados con infraestructuras tecnológicas (almacenamiento, servidores, redes).
Habilidades avanzadas en Python y/o R para análisis y procesamiento de datos.
Conocimiento avanzado de SQL para la gestión y análisis de grandes bases de datos de infraestructura.
Experiencia con herramientas de visualización de datos como Power BI, Tableau o equivalentes.
Conocimientos en modelos predictivos y algoritmos de machine learning aplicados a la optimización de infraestructuras.
Familiaridad con herramientas de monitoreo y análisis de infraestructuras tecnológicas (valorable experiencia con Nagios, Zabbix, Grafana, etc.).
Experiencia trabajando en entornos de almacenamiento, backup y en servidores virtualizados.
Conocimiento en metodologías ETL para la transformación y limpieza de datos de infraestructura.







Te ofrecemos un camino lleno de aventuras:




🔹 ¡Llega hasta donde tú quieras! Crece con nuestros programas de desarrollo! Te ayudaremos a marcar tu itinerario de futuro anualmente participando en proyectos vanguardistas con los mejores profesionales del sector.

🔹 Porque lo importante sois tú y los tuyos : contamos con políticas que facilitan la conciliación entre la vida profesional y personal: Flexibilidad horaria, Smart Job y jornada intensiva en verano.

🔹 Tú decides cómo usar tu dinero: disfruta de nuestra retribución flexible, contamos con: Seguro médico, Ticket Restaurant, Guardería y Transporte.

🔹 Plan Bienestar descuentos en viajes, tecnología, formación, deporte, belleza y ¡muchos más.

🔹 Diviértete participando en los diferentes concursos y actividades que organizamos: ¿te gusta el deporte, escribir, la fotografía? Todo tiene cabida.

🔹¡Actualízate! apostamos por un aprendizaje continuo, contamos con formación especializada, certificaciones e idiomas.

🔹¡Deja tu huella! Impacta con nuestros proyectos de voluntariado social.

¡Únete a la multinacional española tecnológica referente en el mundo! 💫🌎




Atendiendo a la Ley Orgánica 3/2007, de 22 de marzo, Ayesa se ha marcado como objetivo promover la defensa y aplicación efectiva del principio de igualdad entre hombres y mujeres, evitando cualquier tipo de discriminación laboral por razón de sexo, garantizando así las mismas oportunidades de ingreso.

🔹 Plan Bienestar descuentos en viajes, tecnología, formación, deporte, belleza y ¡muchos más.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Seleccionamos un Data Analyst para nuestra oficina de Barcelona o Vic.




Vilar Riba somos una organización de asesoramiento global en los ámbitos fiscal, legal, laboral, consultoría, auditoria y M&A. Contamos con un equipo de más de 175 profesionales especializados y con una trayectoria de más de 30 años de experiencia. También formamos parte de la red Geneva Group Internacional (GGI) la sexta firma mundial de servicios profesionales a empresas.




Principales funciones

-Definición e implantación de cuadros de mando para las distintas áreas de la empresa mediante la utilización de las herramientas Business Intelligence de Microsoft Power BI.

-Obtención de datos, análisis y procesamiento de los mismos.

-Analizar y definir estrategia e identificar nuevas oportunidades

de negocio.

-Comunicación constante con cliente para la toma de requerimientos,

validación y soporte en la utilización.




Requisitos

-Formación de ingeniería, ADE o similar.

-3 años de experiencia en Proyectos de Business Intelligence.

-Experiencia en MS Power BI, lenguaje DAX, configuración de Data Gateway y funcionalidades de PowerQuery.

-Perfil analítico, dinámico y riguroso, acostumbrado a manejar y analizar indicadores de gestión de negocio.

-Valorable buen nivel de inglés.




Ofrecemos

-Proyección profesional basada en la continua adquisición de

conocimientos y experiencia participando en proyectos en organizaciones de

primer nivel.

-Excelente ambiente de trabajo.

-Formar parte de un equipo joven, motivado y altamente

especializado.

-Asumir responsabilidades con clientes.

-Formación:

-Técnica y en idiomas.

-Personalizada a tus necesidades.

-Gestionar proyectos con empresas lideres de la comarca.

-Modelo de teletrabajo híbrido.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Who are we?




HCL Technologies is a next-generation global technology company that helps enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. Our technology products, services, and engineering are built on four decades of innovation, with a world-renowned management philosophy, a strong culture of invention and risk-taking, and a relentless focus on customer relationships.







Currently looking for a skilled Data Analyst to join our team!




As a Data Analyst, you will strengthen our Data Delivery function within the area of Data & Analytics. You have a key role in the success of data product deliveries in the bank. Working in one of our agile Data Delivery teams, you will develop new and maintain existing data integration into our data platform for Finance, Compliance, and Risk. The data platform is hybrid on-prem and cloud build upon AWS, Informatica and Oracle technology.







Key responsibilities:

Solution and Impact Analysis – Define implementation approach – Define validation approach
Data Analysis – Analyzing data and process to complete functional and technical data requirements definition (input for data engineer)
Implementation – Coordination with data engineers and source systems, other components, and data consumers
Validation – Coordination and execution support of testing activities and mitigating actions







Skills & Qualifications:

Strong understanding of banking processes and ability to discuss requirements with business stakeholders
Proven experience of working with data analysis and data requirement management
Excellent proficiency in mapping and analyzing data
Experience in holding conversations with business stakeholders to understand business processes and related data.
Ability to transform business requirements to technical requirements and specifications towards other developers and peers.
Being structured and analytical and can conceptualize complex technical issues
Experience working with Data Warehouses, is an added advantage
Experience and knowledge of agile frameworks, preferably SAFe
Excellent proficiency in SQL to analyze, validate and signoff data
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong time-management skills
Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal)










Why Us?

We are investing in your growth, offering learning and career development opportunities at every level to help you find your spark;
We offer a virtual-first work environment, promoting a good work-life balance and real flexibility;
Our company is extremely diverse with representation of 165 nationalities;
We offer the opportunity to work with colleagues across the globe;
We offer comprehensive benefits for all employees;
We are a certified great place to work and a top employer in 25 countries including Romania, offering a positive work environment that values employee recognition and respect;







HCLTech is committed to protecting and securing the privacy and confidentiality of the Personal Data which it collects directly or indirectly from you when applying for a job at HCLTech either directly or through a third-party human resources agency. This notice (the “Notice”) outlines and explains how HCL Technologies Limited including its subsidiaries, local employing entities, associates, and affiliated companies [collectively referred to as “HCLTech”, “us,” “our”, or “we”] will process your Personal Data in accordance with applicable privacy legislation(s).

https://www.hcltech.com/candidate-privacy-notice

Title: Business Intelligence Specialist
Description:
KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:




Assist with BI activities, design, functional analysis, upgrading and maintenance
Ensure the effectiveness and efficacy of the Reporting Systems, translating big data in meaningful KPIs and evidence
Data Warehouse management
Be a partner for the Business users for every BI activity, to respond in the most effective and efficient way to the business needs of the different areas (Finance, Planning, Sales, Operation, Logistics, Merchandising, etc.)
Support users to understand their needs, translating them into technical specifications, provide assistance and training
Guarantee the congruence and correctness of data according to the company logic
Draw up the documentation
Involved with SW Architecture activities related to BI




KEY REQUIREMENTS:




University degree in Computer Science or similar
Experience (at least two years) in a similar position within international environment of customer-oriented companies – experience abroad will be considered as a plus
Experience in metadata architecture (logic and physics) and front-end design (multidimensional modeling facts / dimensions, reports, analytical applications)
Knowledge of Oracle Data Base and SQL PL / SqL programming languages, MS Sql Server is a plus
Good knowledge and experience of ETL tools and leading front-end BI tools; knowledge of MicroStrategy. In addition knowledge of Qlik is a plus.
Knowledge of the main Microsoft Office Automation tools and Operating Systems in the Microsoft environment
Ability to communicate results/customers’ insight at business levels facilitating action plans definition
Customer and goals orientation
High level of accuracy and problem-solving skills, flexibility and used to work under pressure
Good time management skills
Fluent in oral and written English and Italian (other languages are a plus)

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Data Analyst – Fintech – Foundation Lead – Utrecht




Are you interested in working with huge financial datasets? And are you interested in translating this to the business in order to make the landscape more data-driven? Read on!




Keywords: Python, SQL, Azure, PowerBI




Our client is a dominant financial institution in the Netherlands, covering components in insurance, mortgages, and investments. The company is in full transformation, becoming a financial institution of the future – part of this transformation is the migration of all services/applications to the public cloud.




They are looking for a data analyst who will analyze data from financial sources like pensions, mortgages, and investments. All this data needs to be cleaned and translated to the business through dashboards.




If you are someone with a technical background that also likes to see the bigger picture of how data can be used in a big fintech organization, you are at the right place. They are looking for someone that also likes to challenge and interact with business stakeholders.




Required skills:

At least 2 years of experience in data analytics.
Experience with SQL.
Experience with cloud and tools like PowerBI is a plus.
Strong communication skills in either Dutch or English.




Benefits:

Up to 80K base salary including holiday allowance based on 38 hours.
13th month.
VISA sponsorship.
3% salary raise yearly if that fits the scale.
Pension scheme.
Healthcare insurance contribution.
Insurance discounts.
Participating in employee share plan.
Working from home allowance.
Trainings.
Travel reimbursement / NS Business Card.
Partly paid sabbatical every 5 years.
Hybrid setup – 2 days office.




Focus is on candidates in the Netherlands.




Interested? Please contact me at mette@doghouse-recruitment.nl

Title: Analytics & Insights Analyst
Description:
# 163253 - Piraeus, Attiki, Greece

Who We Are

Colgate-Palmolive Company is a caring, innovative growth company that is reimagining a healthier future for all people, their pets and our planet. Focused on Oral Care, Personal Care, Home Care and Pet Nutrition, we sell our products in more than 200 countries and territories under brands such as Colgate, Palmolive, elmex, hello, meridol, Sorriso, Tom’s of Maine, EltaMD, Filorga, Irish Spring, PCA SKIN, Protex, Sanex, Softsoap, Speed Stick, Ajax, Axion, Fabuloso, Soupline and Suavitel, as well as Hill’s Pet Nutrition.

We are recognised for our leadership and innovation in promoting sustainability and community wellbeing, including our achievements in decreasing plastic waste and promoting recyclability, saving water, conserving natural resources and improving children’s oral health.

If you want to work for a company that lives by their values, then give your career a reason to smile and join our global team!

Join our Customer Development team as an Analytics & Insights Analyst (1-Year contract via Outsource Provider) and be part of a mission for a healthier future for people and the planet.

Role Overview:

In this 1-year contract role, you will translate data into powerful insights that enhance our sales strategies and deepen customer relationships. Your analytical skills will help drive category growth and optimize performance, supporting our mission to deliver products that make a positive impact.

Key Responsibilities:


Data-Driven Insights: Analyze sales data, customer trends, and market movements to unlock growth opportunities.
Sales Performance: Track and monitor key metrics to pinpoint risks, spot trends, and highlight opportunities.
Customer-Centric Solutions: Dive deep into customer behavior to craft insights that shape targeted strategies and fuel engagement.
Category Support: Guide category decisions with data-backed insights on product assortments, pricing, and promotions.
Real-Time Dashboards: Build interactive dashboards for dynamic, on-the-go decision-making.
Predictive Analytics: Forecast future trends and customer needs using advanced models.
Insight Presentation: Present clear, concise findings that influence strategic decisions.


Qualifications:


Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Data Science, or related field.
Experience: 1-2 years in an analytics role within FMCG or consumer industries preferred.
Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Excel. Knowledge of SQL, Python, or R is a plus.
Data Interpreter: Ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.


Location: Athens office

VISA NOT SPONSORED

Our Commitment to Sustainability

With the Colgate brand in more homes than any other, we are presented with great opportunities and new challenges as we work to integrate sustainability into all aspects of our business and create positive social impact. We are determined to position ourselves for further growth as we act on our 2025 Sustainability & Social Impact Strategy.

Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Achieving our purpose starts with our people — ensuring our workforce represents the people and communities we serve —and creating an environment where our people feel they belong; where we can be our authentic selves, feel treated with respect and have the support of leadership to impact the business in a meaningful way.

Equal Opportunity Employer

Colgate is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, ethnicity, age, disability, marital status, veteran status (United States positions), or any other characteristic protected by law.

Reasonable accommodation during the application process is available for persons with disabilities. Please contact Application_Accommodation@colpal.com with the subject "Accommodation Request" should you require accommodation.

Title: Data Analyst
HTML:
Dyninno is a group of companies providing products and services in the travel, finance, entertainment, and technology sectors in 50+ countries. The company develops and implements innovations and technology in its products. Thanks to that, casting professionals quickly find true talent, travelers get the best ticket prices for flights from over 70+ airlines in a fraction of a second, and clients have access to loan products and financial instruments in just one click from anywhere in the world.



EcoFinance is a dynamic and rapidly growing fintech company with operations across Europe and Southeast Asia. Currently, we are active in Moldova, Romania, and the Philippines, with plans for expansion into new markets. We specialize in consumer lending, offering innovative financial solutions that empower individuals and businesses alike.


We are looking for a Data Analyst to join our Data Science and Analysis team in Riga. In this role, you will play a critical part in driving data-driven decisions by collecting, analyzing, and interpreting complex datasets. Your insights will support risk management, optimize portfolio performance, and contribute to the development of analytical solutions that shape business strategy.



Responsibilities:


  • Work with both internal and external data sources for accurate data collection, cleansing, and analysis;
  • Design and implement analytical solutions to support effective risk management strategies;
  • Prepare and interpret regular and ad hoc risk reports, providing actionable insights for management;
  • Draw conclusions from available data and offer recommendations on risk policy adjustments;
  • Collaborate in optimizing risk policies to maximize value from risk models;
  • Participate in portfolio analysis to assess risk exposure, identify trends, and monitor performance metrics across different segments. Provide data-driven recommendations to optimize portfolio performance;
  • Present analytics solutions and findings to stakeholders and help implement improvements into operational systems.


Requirements:


  • Higher education in statistics, applied mathematics, economics, or related discipline.
  • Experience with data extraction, analysis, and reporting.
  • Ability to approach problem-solving analytically with attention to detail.
  • Expert knowledge of SQL for querying large datasets and database management.
  • Knowledge of Python or R for data analysis, and process automation.
  • Open to learning new tools, techniques, and methodologies.
  • Experience with BI tools (e.g., Looker, Power BI) is an advantage.
  • Familiarity with job schedulers (e.g. Cron) is a plus.
  • Basic understanding of building and optimizing ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to support data pipelines.
  • Prior experience in the financial services industry will be considered as an advantage.


There is no one-size-fits-all here, we are quite flexible and use an individual approach with every candidate we meet. While getting familiar during our interview, we try to understand where your working experience, professional skills and future contribution to the company can be applied within our multiple business projects.


We don’t want to set any limits, but if we are naming the numbers, then the salary for this position starts from 2200 EUR gross per month depending on your experience and skills.


With us you will:


  • Be a part of a top-tier team, work on projects that reach millions worldwide, and create complex in-house products and solutions;
  • Learn and exchange ideas in lectures and workshops led by colleagues and team leads;
  • Get health benefits: fully covered health insurance after end of the trial period (dentistry, out-patient treatment, mental health, medicine, etc.), well-being activities, vaccination days;
  • Enjoy employee discount programs and have fun at monthly internal activities and celebrations;
  • Work from a modern and well-equipped office in the center of Riga, with parking space for bikes and scooters, fresh fruits and coffee on a daily basis.


Please note that the processing of your personal data takes place in accordance with the privacy notice, which could be found here - https://dyninno.com/en/privacy-policy/

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
En AXPE Consulting estamos transformando el mundo de la Tecnología. Por ello, te invitamos a vivir una experiencia única desarrollando tu carrera en una Compañía multinacional que mira hacia el futuro. Nuestros valores definen nuestra identidad, son la palanca que nos ayuda a hacer realidad nuestro propósito y guían todas nuestras acciones y decisiones: apostamos por el TALENTO.

Desde el departamento de IT, buscamos un perfil de Data Analyst para participar en un proyecto retador y tecnológicamente innovador en uno de nuestros principales clientes 👩‍🚀🚀




¿Cuál es tu reto?

Liderar iniciativas de análisis de modelos de datos, especialmente en el contexto de una migración de datos.
Capaz de investigar y proponer soluciones de mapeo de datos para cumplir con los modelos de datos de destino
Jugador clave en las conversaciones con la calidad de datos, propietarios de datos y administradores de datos, así como expertos en la materia




¿Qué buscamos de ti?

3 años+ de experiencia laboral como Analista de Datos
Experiencia en análisis y diseño de sistemas de recogida de datos
Mantener relaciones internas y externas garantizando el cumplimiento en todas las actividades.
Buenas habilidades interpersonales y capacidad para trabajar en equipo.
Buena comunicación y capacidad para utilizar diferentes estilos de influencia. Capacidad para adaptar la comunicación y el estilo de liderazgo para gestionar o influir en los colegas.
Gran capacidad analítica para recopilar, organizar, analizar y difundir grandes cantidades de información con atención al detalle y precisión.
Gran capacidad de comunicación escrita y verbal en inglés.




DESEABLE:

Experiencia en modelización de datos
Conocimiento/experiencia con SQL para entornos Hadoop/Big Data
Conocimiento/experiencia con SQL para Postgres/DB2/Bases de datos relacionales




¿Qué te ofrecemos?

📈 Oportunidad de desarrollar tu carrera en contexto global.

👨‍💻 Contrato indefinido.

⚕ Seguro médico a precio reducido (para ti y familiares directos).

📚 Formaciones y certificaciones a nuestro cargo, que te permitan crecer profesionalmente junto a nosotros.

📍 Modalidad 100% Remota.

💸 Salario competitivo.

🚀 Formar parte de una compañía donde se fomentan las comunidades tecnológicas, el intercambio de conocimiento y la excelencia técnica.




En AXPE estamos orgullosos de ser una empresa experta en tecnología que apuesta fuerte por el talento. La responsabilidad corporativa es inherente a nuestro modelo de negocio, impulsamos la educación tecnológica tanto a nivel formativo como laboral.

📢 📢 Formar parte de AXPE es liderar la transformación del sector tecnológico.

Title: Junior Reporting e data analyst
HTML:
Descrizione lavoro:

La Direzione Commerciale per lo sviluppo del Servizio Customer Analytics and Reporting cerca nuove risorse da inserire nel team.

  Si richiede:

  • Attitudine a sintetizzare le informazioni al fine di rappresentare le dinamiche commerciali attraverso tool di BI (Microsoft Power BI) in un’ottica di self-service BI;
  • Predisposizione ad analisi quali/quantitative sulle caratteristiche e le esigenze della Customer Base;
  • Predisposizione all’utilizzo e alla modellazione di basi dati di grandi dimensioni;
  • Capacità e doti di analisi allo scopo di supportare la creazione di reporting che rappresentino le dinamiche commerciali ad uso delle Banche affiliate e dell’Alta Direzione.

Requisiti tecnici:

  • Esperienza e conoscenza di Microsoft BI Power BI: creazione e sviluppo dashboard e conoscenza del processo di distribuzione su Power BI Services
  • Utilizzo del linguaggio SQL (preferibilmente su ambiente Oracle SQL Developer);
  • Esperienza in ambito Business Intelligence;
  • Laurea in: Ingegneria Informatica/Ingegneria Gestionale/Informatica/Matematica/Statistica/Datascience/Fisica/Economia;
  • Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto Office.

Soft skill:

  • Buone capacità di relazione sia nell’interscambio con i colleghi della Direzione Commerciale, sia con gli attori degli altri servizi della Capogruppo che con i referenti esterni delle Banche affiliate;
  • Ottime capacità organizzative e gestione del tempo;
  • Capacità autonoma nella gestione dei propri compiti;
  • Dinamicità, flessibilità, energia;
  • Apertura mentale intesa come disponibilità ad accogliere i cambiamenti del contesto;
  • Completano il profilo un forte orientamento al risultato e al problem solving, spirito di iniziativa proattività ed intraprendenza.

Sede di lavoro: Trento

La suddetta ricerca è aperta a candidature di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso, in ottemperanza e nel rispetto del d.lgs. 198/2006. Per i valori a cui ci ispiriamo, prestiamo particolare attenzione alla diversità, all’inclusività e alla tutela dell’equilibrio fra vita privata e vita professionale.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Are you a Data Analyst seeking a new interesting challenge? 🔍

If your answer is yes, it’s your lucky day so keep reading, it can be just what you're looking for! 👀




✍️WHAT WILL YOU DO?

We are looking for a dynamic, proactive and talented person to join our team and perform the following tasks:

- Lead data model analysis initiatives, in the context of a data migration

- Must be able to investigate and propose data mapping solutions to fulfil target data models

- Key player on conversations with Data Quality Experts, Data Owners and Data Stewards, as well as Subject Matter Experts

- Must be able to support test cycles to clarify doubts and resolve incidences

- Will be reporting to senior management







🧐 WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

- 3yrs+ working experience as a Technical Functional Data Analyst (MUST HAVE)

- Experience in analysis and design of data collection systems (MUST HAVE)

- Track record of developing high quality analysis that has resulted in successful data model definitions and migrations.

- Maintains internal and external relationships ensuring compliance in all activities.

- Good interpersonal skills and ability to work as a team member.

- Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.

- Strong written and verbal communication skills in English. (MUST HAVE)

- Data modelling experience (NICE TO HAVE)

- SQL for Hadoop/Big Data environments experience (NICE TO HAVE)

- Knowledge/experience with SQL for Postgres/DB2/Relational databases (NICE TO HAVE)




📅 WHERE AND WHEN?

Workplace: Remote (from Spain)
Work Schedule: Business Hours




🤝 WHAT CAN WE OFFER YOU?

Permanent contract 📋 - We offer indefinite contracts from the first day.Pay and benefits 💸 - Competitive salary and a flexible compensation plan adapted to your needs (Ticket restaurant plan, Childcare Ticket, Transport Ticket and Health Insurance).Work from home 🏚️ - We offer you a financial support every month for your working from home expenses. In addition, in the first month we will give you a bonus to help you to set up your workplace👨‍💻Opportunity knocks 👍🏻 - Being a part of a growing company, we want to support your path with a career development plan and annual performance-based compensation reviews. Learn as you grow 📚 - Starting with a fantastic onboarding program, TCS has robust learning platforms that will allow you to learn and grow personal as professionally.Bring your buddy 👫 - If you have referred a friend for an open position under the BYB Scheme and she/he is hired you’ll receive a very attractive cash award.Connect globally 🌏 - Work with people from all over the world. You can feel the multicultural workforce.Benefit from being a TCSer 🎟️ – By being part of the TCS Spain family you can enjoy benefits, offers and corporate discounts on the best brands.And so on 🎉 - Appreciations, incentives, Team Building activities, diversity and inclusion programs, sustainability activities, corporative events... This has only just begun!

💡WHO ARE WE?

Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is an Information Technology (IT) company founded in 1968 as part of the Indian Tata Group and is one of the top 3 technology companies globally 🚀




With a presence in 55 countries and more than 615,000 employees, TCS is considered one of the 10 best companies to work for worldwide in 2024 according to the Top Employers Institute 🥇




TCS Spain started operations in 2001 and currently has a diverse workforce that collaborates with the main Spanish and multinational companies 🌏




TCS Spain has been certified as a Top Employer 2024 and has also been chosen as one of the 100 Best Companies to Work for in Spain in 2023 according to Forbes🏆




Among the portfolio of services, TCS has information technology services, asset-based solutions, global consulting, engineering and industrial services, digital solutions and services, application maintenance and development, quality assurance and testing services, IT infrastructure and BPS 🎯




Responsible for development, TCS Spain is committed to inclusion, diversity and sustainability, and promotes flexibility policies that support wellbeing and work-life balance 💯

Title: Data Analyst - Intern (Remote Internship - Data Analysis)
Description:
Delve into the dynamic world of data analysis with an exclusive internship opportunity offered by Kreativstorm, a dynamic and innovative management-consulting firm based in Berlin, Germany. Work remotely with our multinational team and unlock your career aspirations in data analysis!

If you're passionate about data analysis and equipped with problem-solving skills, this internship is perfect for you. Under the guidance of industry experts, you'll tackle diverse data analysis projects, exploring concepts like data visualization, statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and data mining. Gain hands-on experience in uncovering insights and informing decisions, all from the comfort of your home.

Internship Overview and Details:

Location: Fully Remote

Schedule: Part-Time Internship

Duration: 3 months with the possibility of permanent employment after the internship period

Requirements

Ideal Candidates:


Students pursuing a degree or recent graduates in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
Aspiring data analysts keen on unraveling complex datasets and extracting meaningful insights.
Analytical thinkers adept at translating data into actionable recommendations.
Effective communicators who thrive in collaborative team settings.
Detail-oriented individuals excelling in fast-paced, analytical environments.
Enthusiastic learners committed to honing their skills in data analysis.
Proficiency in data analysis tools and programming languages (e.g., Python, R, SQL) highly valued.
Familiarity with statistical techniques, data visualization, and database management advantageous.
Some initial industry experience is a big plus.


Your Contribution:


Contribute to data collection, cleaning, and analysis processes.
Collaborate with the data analysis team to develop analytical models and insights.
Aid in interpreting data trends and patterns to inform strategic decision-making.
Bring fresh perspectives and innovative solutions to tackle data challenges.
Foster a collaborative team environment focused on excellence in data analysis.
Assist in documenting and presenting analysis results and recommendations.


Benefits

Why Join Us?

Kreativstorm is a dynamic and innovative management-consulting firm headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Our team of experienced consultants brings a diverse range of talents and backgrounds, allowing us to provide tailored solutions to businesses of all sizes and industries. As part of the Yes Network Group, LLC, a reputable US holding company, we have access to extensive resources and expertise. Join us and start your journey in data analysis today!

Apply now and pave the way for your future in data analysis!


Show more

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
1. Présentation

Datatorii est une société de conseil spécialisée en data.

Partenaires des directions métiers et IT, nous accompagnons nos clients dans la mise en place de solutions techniques Microsoft ainsi que dans l’analyse de leurs données.




La R&D réalisée en interne (10% du temps, au Dojo) autour de la formation continue et du suivi des évolutions technologiques nous positionne comme un partenaire de choix, spécialisé Data Microsoft.




Organisme de formation, nous accompagnons également nos clients de la prise en main jusqu’à la maîtrise des outils et des méthodes autour de la data.




Nichés dans le 1er arrondissement de Paris, nos locaux vous offrent tout le confort pour vous former, échanger régulièrement avec vos pairs, participer aux ateliers internes et recevoir nos clients.




Datatorii vous donne la possibilité de réaliser vos prochains défis !










2. Mission

La communication en entreprise, interne ou externe, est de plus en plus influencée par la restitution de données, que ce soit via des dashboards, des rapports interactifs ou des présentations au Top Management.




Chez Datatorii, vous évoluerez au sein d’un dispositif pluridisciplinaire (Ingénieur, Data Scientist, Architecte, Chef de projet, Formateur, etc.) qui propose des solutions complètes data :




La récolte du besoin auprès des utilisateurs, la définition de personas, de maquettes et d’user-flow
La création de Style Guides Data et de thèmes clé-en-main pour les projets de visualisation de données
L’accompagnement sur les réalisations (PowerBI, PowerApps, Microsoft Azure, Python, SQL, Modélisation, ...)
La conception d’offres innovantes et leur promotion (UX BI, BI Self-service, Low-code application, Data Management ...)
La réalisation de dashboards et rapports interactifs à fort enjeux
La formation interne ou externe au sein de notre organisme de formation




Grâce à nos parcours de carrière gamifiés, nos training kit et notre dispositif d’accompagnement, Datatorii vous intègre dans un parcours certifiant et vous offre toutes les chances de réussir avec des perspectives de carrière claires et stimulantes.







3. Profil

Formation initiale

BAC +5 Ecole de commerce (Data Analyst, Data Business) ou (Ingénieur, mathématiques, statistiques, informatique)




Connaissances ou expériences

Vous possédez une première expérience significative en DataViz
Vous y avez développé des compétences de Business Analyst (DataViz, UX, Modélisation, etc. )




Qualités

Excellent relationnel
Bon communicant
Proactif
Pédagogue
Capacité d’analyse et de synthèse
Show more

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
The Employer




We are a dynamic and innovative insurance company, specializing in tailored solutions for brands, companies, and broker networks in both Life and Non-Life Insurance. With steady growth over the last 16 years, we have become a prominent player in the international market, spanning seven European countries.

We foster a culture of responsibility and provide a supportive environment for professional growth, leveraging our small size locally to offer significant opportunities. As a key player within the Insurance business line and proudly associated with industry-leading groups, we are both demanding and a source of vast opportunities. Over the years, we have established ourselves as the preferred partner for large retailers within the Group.

 

Role Overview




The role forms part of the Business Applications team. You’ll ensure that critical data is accurate, complete, and maintained to the highest standards. You’ll be at the forefront of shaping and supporting core insurance products while driving the development of business intelligence solutions. Success in this role means leveraging your technical expertise to support business growth, ensuring seamless management of information, and automating processes for maximum efficiency.

 

Key Responsibilities




·       Be the go-to for first-line support & handling system incidents.

·       Assist in gathering requirements, setting up, configuring & maintaining insurance products. Conduct basic QA for product releases.

·       Take ownership of our BI tools, translating business needs into actionable technical specifications.

·       Manage updates to basic Java code and ensure proper version control via Git or similar systems.

·       Assist with process automation and risk management strategies.

·       Generate and troubleshoot reports as needed to support business operations.




Ideal Candidate




You're a skilled problem solver with a proactive mindset, a self-starter who can work independently and collaboratively. A good knowledge of data structures and being able to interpret how data flows in the data chain is pivotal.




Education: Advanced degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
Experience: 2-5 years in a similar technical role.
Languages: Fluent in English. Bonus points for knowledge of French or Spanish
Tech Skills: Knowledge of Java, SQL, and Git. Familiarity with BI technologies (like Power BI, Tableau, or similar). Basic development skills ideally with a basic level of Java, Python or similar OOP language who can manipulate data and elaborate information outside of the BI tool.




What we offer




Indefinite contract.
Flexible working hours.
Hybrid / Remote working policy in place.
Offices based in Sliema, Malta with parking space provided.
Salary commensurate with experience, profile, and qualifications.
Health insurance.
Growth Opportunities: Be part of a team that values innovation, continuous learning, and professional development.
Collaborative Culture: Work alongside passionate professionals in an international setting.
Show more

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Job Title: Data Analyst

Location: Remote-working

Company: The Coaching Masters LTD

Hours: Full-time / with some U.K. morning hours

Salary: $2,500 per month


Why Join Us?

Join The Coaching Masters, a fast-growing, dynamic startup where your passion for data analytics will make a real impact! We're an energetic team of innovators with a global reach, and you’ll be at the forefront of shaping our data-driven strategies. Work with a multicultural team and help drive our business forward by transforming raw data into actionable insights that will directly influence our growth.


Benefits:
25 vacation days per year
Fully remote working
Work in a vibrant, young, and exciting environment
Multicultural team with a global mindset
Wellness benefits to keep you at your best
Clear path for career progression and salary increases based on performance
Access to ongoing educational opportunities to enhance your skills

Job Description:

Are you a data-driven professional passionate about leveraging analytics to shape business outcomes? We are seeking a Data Analyst who excels in data analytics and will play a key role in transforming complex data into valuable insights. Your expertise will drive strategic decisions and influence our business performance.

You will work closely with senior leadership to understand business needs, define key metrics, and develop insightful data dashboards. While building and maintaining data dashboards is part of your role, your primary focus will be on analyzing data from various sources, including Supabase (our transactional and user data), Mixpanel (tracking software), and advertising platforms like Google Ads, Meta Ads, and TikTok Ads.


Key Responsibilities:
Data Analytics: Analyze data from multiple sources to extract actionable insights, identifying trends, opportunities, and potential areas for improvement that can drive business growth.
Design and Build Dashboards: Collaborate to create intuitive dashboards that effectively visualize key metrics, enabling stakeholders to make informed decisions based on real-time data.
Data Interpretation: Work with senior leadership to understand business goals, ensuring data accuracy and relevance while identifying critical metrics for tracking performance.
Data Integration: Ensure seamless integration of data from platforms (Supabase, Mixpanel, Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok Ads) into dashboards for comprehensive analysis.
Performance Monitoring: Regularly update and maintain dashboards, providing timely insights that reflect the latest data.
Provide Strategic Recommendations: Analyze findings to make data-driven recommendations aimed at improving business processes, marketing performance, and customer engagement.
Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams, including marketing and leadership, to ensure data initiatives align with ongoing business objectives.

Required Skills:
Data Analytics Expertise: Proven ability to analyze complex data sets and provide actionable insights that inform strategic decisions.
Data Visualization: Skill in creating clear, intuitive, and informative visualizations that simplify complex data and make it accessible to stakeholders.
Business Metrics Understanding: Strong grasp of key performance indicators relevant to business, marketing, and operations.
Collaboration Skills: Ability to work effectively with various teams to translate business requirements into impactful data solutions.

Preferred Skills:
Familiarity with data visualization tools and platforms (e.g., Retool, Tableau, Power BI).
Experience working with Supabase and Mixpanel.
Knowledge of advertising platforms such as Google Ads, Meta Ads, and TikTok Ads.
Strong attention to detail and capability to work with large datasets.
Analytical mindset with a talent for identifying trends and generating insights.
Previous experience in a startup environment is a plus.

Why The Coaching Masters?

We are passionate about making a difference and seek someone who shares that passion for impact-driven work. If you’re a data analyst who thrives on transforming complex data into valuable insights and enjoys working in a fun, flexible, and diverse environment—this is the role for you!




Apply today and become part of a team that’s all about making real, meaningful change through data!

Show more

  • Access to ongoing educational opportunities to enhance your skills
Job Description:

Are you a data-driven professional passionate about leveraging analytics to shape business outcomes? We are seeking a Data Analyst who excels in data analytics and will play a key role in transforming complex data into valuable insights. Your expertise will drive strategic decisions and influence our business performance.

You will work closely with senior leadership to understand business needs, define key metrics, and develop insightful data dashboards. While building and maintaining data dashboards is part of your role, your primary focus will be on analyzing data from various sources, including Supabase (our transactional and user data), Mixpanel (tracking software), and advertising platforms like Google Ads, Meta Ads, and TikTok Ads.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Data Analytics: Analyze data from multiple sources to extract actionable insights, identifying trends, opportunities, and potential areas for improvement that can drive business growth.
  • Design and Build Dashboards: Collaborate to create intuitive dashboards that effectively visualize key metrics, enabling stakeholders to make informed decisions based on real-time data.
  • Data Interpretation: Work with senior leadership to understand business goals, ensuring data accuracy and relevance while identifying critical metrics for tracking performance.
  • Data Integration: Ensure seamless integration of data from platforms (Supabase, Mixpanel, Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok Ads) into dashboards for comprehensive analysis.
  • Performance Monitoring: Regularly update and maintain dashboards, providing timely insights that reflect the latest data.
  • Provide Strategic Recommendations: Analyze findings to make data-driven recommendations aimed at improving business processes, marketing performance, and customer engagement.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams, including marketing and leadership, to ensure data initiatives align with ongoing business objectives.
Required Skills:
  • Data Analytics Expertise: Proven ability to analyze complex data sets and provide actionable insights that inform strategic decisions.
  • Data Visualization: Skill in creating clear, intuitive, and informative visualizations that simplify complex data and make it accessible to stakeholders.
  • Business Metrics Understanding: Strong grasp of key performance indicators relevant to business, marketing, and operations.
  • Collaboration Skills: Ability to work effectively with various teams to translate business requirements into impactful data solutions.
Preferred Skills:
  • Familiarity with data visualization tools and platforms (e.g., Retool, Tableau, Power BI).
  • Experience working with Supabase and Mixpanel.
  • Knowledge of advertising platforms such as Google Ads, Meta Ads, and TikTok Ads.
  • Strong attention to detail and capability to work with large datasets.
  • Analytical mindset with a talent for identifying trends and generating insights.
  • Previous experience in a startup environment is a plus.
Why The Coaching Masters?

We are passionate about making a difference and seek someone who shares that passion for impact-driven work. If you’re a data analyst who thrives on transforming complex data into valuable insights and enjoys working in a fun, flexible, and diverse environment—this is the role for you!


Apply today and become part of a team that’s all about making real, meaningful change through data!

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Are you a Data Analyst seeking a new interesting challenge? 🔍

If your answer is yes, it’s your lucky day so keep reading, it can be just what you're looking for! 👀




✍️WHAT WILL YOU DO?

We are looking for a dynamic, proactive and talented person to join our team and perform the following tasks:

- Improve/refactor some legacy processes to improve the efficiencies, remove obsolesces and move the processes to AWS cloud.




🧐 WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

- +3 years of experience working with data.

- Proactive Technical analyst with experience in large datasets, data comparison and gap analysis.

- Capable to write and understand SQL medium/complex queries.

- Experienced Excel user.

- Experience working in Hadoop environments, HUE, Impala, Hive…

- Experience investigating data quality issues and mismatches.

- Ability to work close to the technical team.

- Able to speak SPANISH and ENGLISH (ADVANCED LEVEL BOTH MANDATORY)

- Good understanding of Spark (Nice to Have)




📅 WHERE AND WHEN?

Workplace: Remote (from Spain)
Work Schedule: Business Hours




🤝 WHAT CAN WE OFFER YOU?

Permanent contract 📋 - We offer indefinite contracts from the first day.Pay and benefits 💸 - Competitive salary and a flexible compensation plan adapted to your needs (Ticket restaurant plan, Childcare Ticket, Transport Ticket and Health Insurance).Work from home 🏚️ - We offer you a financial support every month for your working from home expenses. In addition, in the first month we will give you a bonus to help you to set up your workplace👨‍💻Opportunity knocks 👍🏻 - Being a part of a growing company, we want to support your path with a career development plan and annual performance-based compensation reviews. Learn as you grow 📚 - Starting with a fantastic onboarding program, TCS has robust learning platforms that will allow you to learn and grow personal as professionally.Bring your buddy 👫 - If you have referred a friend for an open position under the BYB Scheme and she/he is hired you’ll receive a very attractive cash award.Connect globally 🌏 - Work with people from all over the world. You can feel the multicultural workforce.Benefit from being a TCSer 🎟️ – By being part of the TCS Spain family you can enjoy benefits, offers and corporate discounts on the best brands.And so on 🎉 - Appreciations, incentives, Team Building activities, diversity and inclusion programs, sustainability activities, corporative events... This has only just begun!

💡WHO ARE WE?

Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is an Information Technology (IT) company founded in 1968 as part of the Indian Tata Group and is one of the top 3 technology companies globally 🚀




With a presence in 55 countries and more than 615,000 employees, TCS is considered one of the 10 best companies to work for worldwide in 2024 according to the Top Employers Institute 🥇




TCS Spain started operations in 2001 and currently has a diverse workforce that collaborates with the main Spanish and multinational companies 🌏




TCS Spain has been certified as a Top Employer 2024 and has also been chosen as one of the 100 Best Companies to Work for in Spain in 2023 according to Forbes🏆




Among the portfolio of services, TCS has information technology services, asset-based solutions, global consulting, engineering and industrial services, digital solutions and services, application maintenance and development, quality assurance and testing services, IT infrastructure and BPS 🎯




Responsible for development, TCS Spain is committed to inclusion, diversity and sustainability, and promotes flexibility policies that support wellbeing and work-life balance 💯

Title: BI Data Analyst
Description:
Davidson Consulting España nace en el año 2014. Formamos parte del grupo Davidson, multinacional francesa de servicios tecnológicos con +18 años de experiencia en el sector y presencia en varios países europeos además de en Canadá. Somos 3000 compañeros a nivel global.

En España nos caracterizamos por ser un equipo de más de 150 profesionales altamente cualificados y apasionados por el mundo de la tecnología y la innovación. Por ello, nuestro objetivo es seguir aumentando el equipo para continuar involucrados en proyectos nacionales e internacionales de gran envergadura.




En Davidson estamos buscando un BI Data Analyst con experiencia en la construcción de soluciones de datos avanzadas para unirse a nuestro equipo, con experiencia en la creación de tuberías de datos utilizando PySpark, desarrollo de cubos tabulares con Analysis Services (DAX), y creación de dashboards en Power BI.




Responsabilidades:

Construcción de tuberías de datos con PySpark.
Desarrollo de cubos tabulares utilizando Analysis Services (DAX).
Creación de tableros interactivos con Power BI.
Evaluación de necesidades y establecimiento de una lista de requisitos funcionales y técnicos.
Coordinación con equipos de terceros (equipo de integración de datos y equipo de Datalake).
Implementación de procesos de ingesta y transformación de datos.
Aplicación de cálculos y filtros específicos según los requisitos.
Implementación de medidas de seguridad y control de acceso.




Objetivos:

Diseñar soluciones técnicas que cubran las necesidades del proyecto, incluyendo el modelo de datos, flujo de integración y mapeo de datos.
Construir y gestionar la capa de integración basada en Azure Datalake, utilizando herramientas como DAX, PySpark, Databricks, Azure Analysis Services y Azure DevOps.
Desarrollar dashboards de Power BI conectados a cubos de Azure.
Implementar cálculos específicos según las necesidades del negocio.




¿Qué ofrecemos?

Modelo de trabajo híbrido en Madrid.
Contratación indefinida.
Salario competitivo según valía y experiencia aportada.
Plan de carrera y desarrollo profesional.




¿Por qué unirte a nosotros?

Nos caracterizamos por el excelente trato a los compañeros y una estructura organizativa horizontal. Te sentirás arropado y como en casa, tu opinión siempre importa. Contarás con oportunidades reales de crecimiento y proyección.

Si estás interesad@ en participar en el proceso de selección o simplemente quieres conocer más sobre estas oportunidades, ¡no dudes en postularte a la oferta!




#DavidsonConsulting #TeRetamosAFicharPorNosotros

Show more
